TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions, class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplateHost, class System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor
Public Class DynamicControl Inherits Control Implements IAttributeAccessor, IFieldFormattingOptions, IFieldTemplateHost
public ref class DynamicControl : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::DynamicData::IFieldFormattingOptions, System::Web::DynamicData::IFieldTemplateHost, System::Web::UI::IAttributeAccessor
type DynamicControl = class inherit Control interface IAttributeAccessor interface IFieldTemplateHost interface IFieldFormattingOptions

summary.span: 使用 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 功能，顯示樣板化資料繫結控制項中欄位所定義的內容。

span.span: Displays the content that is defined for the field in templated data-bound controls, using ASP.NET Dynamic Data features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項使用樣板化的資料繫結控制項，例如或，用來顯示資料欄位使用自訂的頁面中的 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 功能。The control is used by templated data-bound controls, such as or , to display a data field that uses ASP.NET Dynamic Data features in a custom page. 您也可以使用在中控制可欄位或控制項。You can also use a control in a field of a or a control. 控制項提供類似的功能欄位。The control provides functionality that is similar to that of the field. 不過，因為控制項只用在範本內，它可讓您更大的彈性來控制資料的方式顯示，因為您可以新增其他欄位周圍的 HTML 項目。However, because the control is only used inside templates, it gives you more flexibility in controlling how the data is displayed since you can add other HTML elements around the field. 當您使用控制項，您可以利用下列的動態資料功能：When you use a control, you can take advantage of the following Dynamic Data features: - 自動轉譯適當的控制項欄位使用欄位範本為基礎的資料類型。Automatically rendering the proper control for a field by using field templates, based on the data type. 整個應用程式都可以修改全域的欄位範本。The field templates can be globally modified for the entire application. - 提供根據資料庫結構描述的內建的資料驗證。Providing built-in data validation based on the database schema. 您也可以加入自訂資料模型的驗證類型。You can also add validation types by customizing the data model. - 使用資料模型中的屬性，或使用自訂的個別欄位的資料呈現屬性。Customizing data rendering for individual fields by using attributes in the data model or by using the property. 若要指定要在顯示的欄位控制項，並設定的欄位名稱的屬性。To specify the field to display in a control, set the property to the field name. 您也可以設定至欄位值套用的自訂格式化字串屬性。You can apply a custom formatting string to the field value by setting the property. 根據預設，格式化字串會套用至欄位值，將資料繫結控制項處於唯讀模式時才。By default, the formatting string is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode. 若要將格式字串套用至顯示的資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時的值，設定屬性設`true`。To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 如果欄位值是`null`，您可以藉由設定顯示的自訂標題屬性。If a field value is `null`, you can display a custom caption by setting the property. 控制項可以將空字串也會自動轉換 ("") 欄位值為 null 的值，藉由設定屬性設`true`。The control can also automatically convert empty string ("") field values to null values by setting the property to `true`. 控制項支援不同的顯示模式。The control supports different display modes. 若要指定要在其中顯示模式控制項，並設定屬性。To specify the mode in which to display the control, set the property. 下表顯示不同的模式。The following table shows the different modes. 用於顯示模式。for display mode. 這可以防止使用者修改一筆資料錄或資料欄位的值。This prevents the user from modifying the values of a record or a data field. 它可以用於任何範本。It can be used in any of the templates. 編輯模式。for edit mode. 這可讓使用者更新現有的資料錄的值。This enables users to update the values of an existing record. 它會在 編輯範本 (通常命名為`EditItemTemplate`)。It is used in the edit template (typically named `EditItemTemplate`). 用於插入模式。for insert mode. 這可讓使用者輸入新資料錄的值。This enables users to enter values for a new record. 它會插入範本中使用 (通常命名為`InsertItemTemplate`)。It is used in the insert template (typically named `InsertItemTemplate`). 您可以隱藏藉由設定資料繫結控制項中的控制項屬性設`false`。You can hide a control in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 這項功能的執行階段程式碼範例，請參閱：[執行](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl)。See a run-time code example of this feature: [Run](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl). 下列範例示範如何使用控制在控制項來顯示、 插入、 刪除和編輯資料庫資料表中的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the control in a control to display, insert, delete and edit values from a database table. 請務必請注意，為了進行運作，插入作業屬性`rowguid`並`ModifiedDate`資料行設定`true`。It is important to notice that in order to make the insert operation to work, the property of the `rowguid` and `ModifiedDate` columns are set to `true`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示當資料欄位處於編輯模式時， 屬性指定的格式化字串是否套用至欄位值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the formatting string specified by the property is applied to field values when the field is in edit mode.

value.span: 如果套用格式化字串則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the formatting string is applied; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項有不同的顯示模式，可讓使用者讀取、 編輯或插入的欄位。The control has different display modes that allow the user to read, edit, or insert a field. 根據預設，格式化指定的字串屬性套用至欄位值時，才控制項處於唯讀模式。By default, the formatting string specified by the property is applied to a field value only when the control is in read-only mode. 若要將格式字串套用至顯示的資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時的值，設定屬性設`true`。To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 控制項不會自動移除設定格式化的資料來源中更新的欄位時。The control does not automatically remove the formatting when the field is updated in the data source. 如果您不想格式化的儲存值的一部分，您必須移除設定格式化以程式設計的方式。If you do not want the formatting as part of the value stored, you will need to remove the formatting programmatically.

summary.span: 取得或設定與控制項相關聯的資料行物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the column object that is associated with the control.

value.span: 與控制項相關聯的資料行物件。

span.span: The column object that is associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性，以取得有關特定資料行中繼資料資訊。You can use the property to obtain metadata information about a specific column. 屬性會由自動設定控制會根據提供的欄位名稱屬性。The property is automatically set by the control based on the field name provided for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ConvertEmptyStringToNull { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ConvertEmptyStringToNull : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示在資料來源中更新資料欄位時，是否將空字串值 ("") 自動轉換為 null 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to null values when the data field is updated in the data source.

value.span: 如果空字串值會自動轉換為 null 值則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if empty string values are automatically converted to null values; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料來源控制項的物件也有一個名為。The object of the data source control also has a property named . 這個屬性執行相同的功能。This property performs the same function. 請確定已適當地設定這兩個屬性。Make sure that both properties are set appropriately.

value.span: CSS 類別的名稱。

span.span: The name of the CSS class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataField : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項所繫結的資料欄位名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data field that the control is bound to.

value.span: 要繫結 控制項的資料欄位名稱。

span.span: The name of the data field to bind the control to.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定資料欄位繫結至控制項。Use the property to specify the data field to bind to the control. 資料欄位可以是資料行名稱，或在外部索引鍵資料行，此關聯性名稱。The data field can be the column name or, for foreign key columns, the relationship name. 根據預設，指定的資料欄位會顯示由控制使用的欄位資料型別相關聯的欄位樣板。By default, the specified data field is displayed by the control using the field template that is associated with the field data type. 您可以變更設定呈現資料欄位的欄位樣板屬性。You can change the field template that is rendered for the data field by setting the property. 您也可以藉由設定格式化顯示的文字屬性。You can also format the displayed text by setting the property. **附註**如果您想要變更全域的顯示和行為的資料欄位，您必須將屬性套用至您的資料模型，而不是此設定中的特定執行個體控制項。**Note** If you want to change the display and behavior of a data field globally, you must apply attributes to your data model instead of setting this in a particular instance of the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示的欄位控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which field to display in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.DataField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.DataField/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.DataField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.DataField/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataFormatString : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，這個字串指定欄位值的顯示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 指定欄位值顯示格式的格式化字串。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未將特殊格式套用至該欄位值。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定自訂的顯示格式中顯示的值為控制項。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values displayed in the control. 如果未設定屬性、 欄位值會顯示不含任何特殊格式設定。If the property is not set, the field value is displayed without any special formatting. 根據預設，格式化字串套用至欄位值時，才屬性設定為。By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the property is set to . 若要將格式字串套用至欄位值，在編輯模式中，設定屬性設`true`。To apply the formatting string to the field value while in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 使用指定的顯示格式屬性是此執行個體專用控制項。The display format that you specify using the property is specific to this instance of the control. 您也可以變更跨整個應用程式資料欄位的顯示格式，藉由套用至您的資料模型和設定具名參數的建構函式。You can also change the display format for a data field across the entire application by applying the to your data model and setting the named parameter in the constructor. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HtmlEncode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.HtmlEncode : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示控制項的資料在呈現之前是否進行 HTML 編碼。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data for the control is HTML-encoded before rendering.

value.span: 如果控制項的資料在呈現之前進行 HTML 編碼則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the data for the control is HTML-encoded before rendering; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定欄位值之前是否進行 HTML 編碼成其各自的字串表示法顯示。Use the property to specify whether field values are HTML-encoded to their respective string representations before they are displayed. > [!NOTE] > HTML 編碼的欄位值可協助您防止跨網站指令碼攻擊和惡意內容顯示出來。HTML-encoding field values helps to prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being displayed. 可能的話，應該啟用這個屬性。This property should be enabled whenever possible. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataBoundControlMode Mode { System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataBoundControlMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataBoundControlMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定呈現模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the rendering mode.

value.span: 一個列舉值，指定控制項的呈現模式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the rendering mode for the control.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性來指定要用來顯示的轉譯模式控制項。Use the property to specify which rendering mode to use to display the control. 下表顯示不同的模式。The following table shows the different modes. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||用於顯示模式。for display mode. 這可以防止使用者修改一筆資料錄或資料欄位的值。This prevents the user from modifying the values of a record or a data field. 它可以用於任何範本。It can be used in any of the templates. 這是預設值。This is the default value.| ||編輯模式。for edit mode. 這可讓使用者更新現有的資料錄的值。This enables users to update the values of an existing record. 它用在`EditItemTemplate`範本。It is used in the `EditItemTemplate` template.| ||用於插入模式。for insert mode. 這可讓使用者輸入新資料錄的值。This enables users to enter values for a new record. 它用在`InsertItemTemplate`範本。It is used in the `InsertItemTemplate` template.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NullDisplayText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NullDisplayText : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定資料欄位值為 時該欄位所顯示的標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption that is displayed for a data field when the field value is .

value.span: 資料欄位值為 時該欄位所顯示的標題。

span.span: The caption that is displayed for a data field when the field value is .

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時欄位值是資料來源中儲存為 null。Sometimes a field value is stored as null in the data source. 您可以指定要設定具有 null 值的欄位中顯示自訂標題屬性。You can specify a custom caption to display for fields that have a null value by setting the property. 如果未設定這個屬性，null 的欄位值顯示為空字串 ("")。If this property is not set, null field values are displayed as empty strings ("").

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnInit(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnInit (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnInit : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnInit : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.span: The property is not set.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Renders the control content to the client's browser by using the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員用來擴充控制項。The method is primarily used by control developers to extend the control.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property FormattingOptions As IFieldFormattingOptions Implements IFieldTemplateHost.FormattingOptions

summary.span: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 。

span.span: For a description of this member, see .

value.span: 要套用至欄位樣板的格式化選項。

span.span: The formatting options to be applied to the field template.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Table As MetaTable
public: virtual property System::Web::DynamicData::MetaTable ^ Table { System::Web::DynamicData::MetaTable ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與控制項相關聯的資料表物件。

span.span: Gets the table object that is associated with the control.

value.span: 與控制項相關聯的資料表物件。

span.span: The table object that is associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取相關資料表所包含的資料繫結控制項關聯的中繼資料資訊控制項。Use the property to access metadata information about the table that is associated with the data-bound control that contains the control.

exception.span: 控制項是一種在資料繫結控制項內的控制項，它不會繫結至實作 介面的資料來源控制項。

span.span: The control is inside a data-bound control that is not bound to a data source control that implements the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string UIHint { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property UIHint As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ UIHint { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.UIHint : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用來呈現資料欄位的欄位樣板名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field template that is used to render the data field.

value.span: 用來呈現資料欄位的欄位樣板名稱。

span.span: The name of the field template that is used to render the data field.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示欄位樣板將會根據資料欄位型別或套用於資料模型的中繼資料資訊來呈現。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the field template will be rendered based on the data field type or on metadata information applied to the data model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要用來顯示資料欄位的使用者介面的欄位樣板。Use the property to specify the field template to use to display the UI for a data field. 預設的欄位範本使用者控制項，而且其名稱包含後置詞來識別欄位的範本，可用於編輯作業和插入作業。Field templates by default are user controls and their names contain a suffix to identify field templates that are used for edit operations and insert operations. 尾碼會分別為 （_e） 和 （_i）。The suffixes are _edit and _insert, respectively. 當您將值設屬性，設定沒有後置字元的名稱。When you set a value to the property, you set the name without the suffixes. 動態資料會識別正確的模式，藉由評估屬性值，而會呈現正確的欄位樣板。Dynamic Data will identify the correct mode by evaluating the property value and will render the correct field template. 如果屬性未設定，根據預設，動態資料會轉譯根據欄位類型的欄位樣板。If the property is not set, by default Dynamic Data will render the field template based on the field type. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 動態資料 Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e0166a58-9178-4660-81a6-175994b11b12)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data Scaffolding](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e0166a58-9178-4660-81a6-175994b11b12). 使用指定的欄位樣板屬性是此執行個體專用控制項。The field template that you specify using the property is specific to this instance of the control. 您也可以變更使用由整個應用程式藉由套用資料欄位的欄位樣板到您的資料模型。You can also change the field template used by a data field across the entire application by applying the to your data model. 設定屬性會覆寫套用至資料模型的中繼資料。Setting the property overrides the metadata applied to the data model. 如需有關中繼資料屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Dynamic Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512)。For more information about metadata attributes, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78c7fcd7-5f38-46a0-a4bc-48eff3c8a512). ## Examples 這項功能的執行階段程式碼範例，請參閱：[執行](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint)。See a run-time code example of this feature: [Run](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint). 下列範例會示範如何指定資料欄位，使用不同的欄位範本來呈現其內容。The following example shows how you can specify a data field to use a different field template to render its contents. 第二個範例會顯示所指定的自訂欄位範本屬性。The second example shows the custom field template specified by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint/VB/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint/CS/Email.ascx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicControl.UIHint/VB/Email.ascx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的驗證群組名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the validation group name for the control.

value.span: 控制項的驗證群組名稱。

span.span: The validation group name for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將在頁面上的驗證控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以單獨驗證，從其他頁面上的驗證群組。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性來指定驗證群組的名稱，控制項引發驗證，當頁面回傳至伺服器。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when the page posts back to the server.
